Description: Reports focus on the friction between Skydance and Shari Redstone/Paramount. Detailed the complex "dual-class" hurdles.
Reporting highlights Larry Ellison's crucial role as the financial "engine" providing the creditworthiness for the deal.
Paramount pays $16M to settle Trump's defamation lawsuit. Described as a "peace offering" to clear regulatory paths.
Trump administration approves the merger. Critics cited by Post call it a "corrupt reward" for the settlement and support.
Skydance takes control. David Ellison promises "I do not want to politicize our company" to calm staff fears.
David Ellison buys Bari Weiss's 'The Free Press' for $150M. Weiss appointed EIC of CBS News.
Rumors of a bid for Warner Bros. Discovery (CNN) swirl. Reports note CNN staff are "unsettled" by prospect of Ellison control.
Skydance fails to acquire WBD. Post reports CNN staff feel "relief" at avoiding the "culture clash" seen at CBS.
WaPo reports on the friction between Skydance and Paramount (Shari Redstone).
Reporting highlights Larry Ellison's crucial role as the financial backer of the deal.
Paramount pays $16M to settle Trump's lawsuit.
Trump administration approves the merger. Critics call it a "corrupt reward."
Skydance takes control. David Ellison promises "no politicization" of CBS.
David Ellison buys The Free Press for $150M; appoints Bari Weiss EIC of CBS News.
Rumors swirl of a Skydance bid for Warner Bros. Discovery. CNN staff unsettled.
Skydance fails to acquire WBD. CNN expresses relief at avoiding Ellison control.
